Package com.sicomsa.dmt.svc

Class SvcSignatureFactory

java.lang.Object
com.sicomsa.dmt.svc.SvcSignatureFactory
public class SvcSignatureFactory extends Object
Provides digital signature related methods needed for the WS this package was made for.
Since:
1.0
Version:
2024.10.31
Author:
Beto Lopez

    • newAuthSignature

      public XMLSignature newAuthSignature(String uri, Node tokenReference) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Returns the XMLSignature used for authentication on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      uri - the uri for the reference
      tokenReference - the Node with the tokenReference
      Returns:
      the XMLSignature used for authentication on the specified parameters
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if there were security related problems
      NullPointerException - if tokenReference is null.

    • newGenericSignature

      public XMLSignature newGenericSignature(String uri, X509Certificate cert) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Returns the XMLSignature used for generic requests messages on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      uri - reference uri
      cert - the certificate to use
      Returns:
      the XMLSignature used for generic requests messages on the specified parameters
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if there were security related problems
      NullPointerException - if cert is null.
